meanings.definition: A person who offers congratulations or good wishes.
meanings.sent1: The felicitators cheered and clapped for the newlyweds.
meanings.sent2: The felicitators sent a card to celebrate the promotion.
meanings.sent3: The felicitators brought balloons and cake to the party.
meanings.sent4: The felicitators were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The felicitators' smiles were contagious and heartwarming.

meanings.definition: To congratulate or offer good wishes to someone.
meanings.sent1: We felicitators praised our friend on their achievement.
meanings.sent2: She felicitators her colleague on their work anniversary.
meanings.sent3: The team felicitators each other after a successful project.
meanings.sent4: His words felicitators her soul and lifted her spirits.
meanings.sent5: The crowd felicitators the champion with loud cheers and applause.
